## packet ip assign

Assigns an IP address to a given device

### Synopsis

Example:

packet ip assign -d [device-id] -a [ip-address]

	

```
packet ip assign [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -a, --address string     IP Address
  -d, --device-id string   UUID of the device
  -h, --help               Help for assign
```

